mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TP3_MAKEGROUP WHERE G_MANAGER=#{g_manager} AND G_SEQ=(SELECT MAX(G_SEQ) FROM TP3_MAKEGROUP)

SELECT DISTINCT TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_SEQ, TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_NAME, TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_TYPE, TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_MANAGER, TP3_GROUPMEMBER.M_ID, TP3_GROUPMEMBER.G_AUTH FROM TP3_GROUPMEMBER INNER JOIN TP3_MAKEGROUP ON TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_SEQ=TP3_MAKEGROUP.G_SEQ WHERE TP3_GROUPMEMBER.M_ID=#{m_id} ORDER BY G_SEQ

SELECT TP3_SISTMEMBER.M_ID,m_name, m_nickname, m_highschool, m_university, m_office, m_address,m_profile, g_seq, g_auth FROM TP3_SISTMEMBER INNER JOIN TP3_GROUPMEMBER ON TP3_SISTMEMBER.M_ID=TP3_GROUPMEMBER.M_ID WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq} AND M_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
